categories: Category:Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures episodes

nodes.text: Stormtroopers vs. Rebels – Soldiers of the Galactic Empire
"Stormtroopers vs. Rebels – Soldiers of the Galactic Empire" is the fifteenth episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on StarWarsKids.com and YouTube on February 15, 2019.

The narrator introduces stormtroopers as the backbone of the Imperial Army. Several stormtroopers disembark from a Sentinel-class landing craft onto the beaches of Scarif. TIE fighters and shuttles fly overhead. Stormtroopers fight Rebel Alliance ground forces outside the Imperial security complex on Scarif.

The video then shifts to footage of snowtroopers charging through the snowy trenches of Echo Base alongside AT-AT walkers. The video then moves to footage of stormtroopers exchanging fire with Partisans in the streets of Jedha City. A stormtrooper fires a missile launcher and the video then flashes to shots of stormtroopers patrolling Garel City. The video then shifts to footage of scout troopers racing on 74-Z speeder bikes through the forests of Endor. Stormtroopers are also engaged in combat.

The video then switches back to footage of death troopers fighting rebel forces on the beaches of Scarif. A soldier barks orders to seize the area. The video then ends with footage of a stormtrooper charging under a hail of enemy fire to plant the Imperial flag on the battlefield. The stormtrooper and their comrades then stand at attention against a backdrop of Imperial Star Destroyers, TIE fighters, and the Death Star.
